players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was killed on the first night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to figure out who could have done this."
Diana: "I believe it's important that we all work together to uncover the truth behind Alice's death. Let's share any information or suspicions we may have, no matter how small they seem."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
